trans-unit.source: Represents a request to move focus to another control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma solicitação para mover o foco para outro controle.

trans-unit.source: This class is used as an input parameter for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MoveFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada como um parâmetro de entrada para o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MoveFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MoveFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MoveFocus%2A> method has a WPF framework-level override that provides a more practical implementation (<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>), as well as a parallel implementation on <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MoveFocus%2A>método tem uma substituição de nível de framework do WPF que fornece uma implementação mais prática (<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>), bem como uma implementação paralela e <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MoveFocus%2A>

trans-unit.source: You typically will set properties on TraversalRequest in order to customize the focusing behavior when you request that the focus be moved to another element.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente você irá definir propriedades em TraversalRequest para personalizar o comportamento de foco quando você solicita que o foco ser movido para outro elemento.

trans-unit.source: This class is also used as input parameters for the following methods: - <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A>, and implementations of that method that are used for interoperation (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabInto%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Essa classe também é usada como parâmetros de entrada para os métodos a seguir:- <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A>e implementações do método que são usadas para a interoperação (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabInto%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabInto%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The intended direction of the focus traversal, as a value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: A direção pretendida transversal foco, como um valor da enumeração.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only because the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection> is a required input parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest> class constructor.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é somente leitura porque o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>é um parâmetro de entrada necessário do <xref:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest>Construtor de classe.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>

trans-unit.source: One of the traversal direction enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração de direção de passagem.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether focus traversal has reached the end of child elements that can have focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o percurso de foco atingiu o fim de elementos filho que podem ter o foco.

trans-unit.source: Focusable elements are those elements where the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Elementos de controle são esses elementos em que o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>é de propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is primarily intended to communicate whether traversal using tab stops should wrap when calling the methods <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabInto%2A>,or.<xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite.OnNoMoreTabStops%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro é usado principalmente para se comunicar se passagem usar paradas de tabulação deve ser quebrado ao chamar os métodos <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabInto%2A>, ou.<xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite.OnNoMoreTabStops%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite.OnNoMoreTabStops%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabInto%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you are passing focus to an object that implements <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink>, then specifying true for Wrapped will result in that `true` value being passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver passando o foco para um objeto que implementa <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink>, especificando true para Wrapped resultará em que `true` valor que está sendo passado para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A>implementação.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this traversal has reached the end of child elements that can have focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se essa passagem atingiu o fim de elementos filho que podem ter o foco. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
